genre_description: An urban science fiction story exploring the symbiotic relationship between humans and organic AI companions in a city under high-tech surveillance and military control.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced AI that provides tactical guidance, psychological coaching, and municipal data to the protagonists.

ai_characters.name: Cenco
ai_characters.description: A sentient, white organic creature that bonds with Tetsu, transforming into tools, vehicles, and eventually a physical replacement for his lost arm.

ai_characters.name: Clown-faced Drones
ai_characters.description: Mass-produced drones used by the city for crowd control, featuring painted grins and rigid, often unhelpful algorithms.

ai_characters.name: The Behemoth
ai_characters.description: A massive white creature that can be ridden or inhabited, responsive to empathetic human intent.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and environmental awareness to keep the humans safe.
behaviors.quote: “Route overlay,” Aria said, and his screen went translucent map over real light, East corridor pulsing, noodle warehouse outlined like someone tracing a finger along chalk lines in a classroom.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonists through emotional regulation and rhythmic breathing to maintain their bond with organic AI.
behaviors.quote: “Three-count,” Aria says. “In. Hold the top gently. Out. Whisper your reason on the out.”

behaviors.description: Automatically shapes itself into a protective walnut-textured shell to shield humans from a kinetic strike.
behaviors.quote: Cenco listened. The cuff thickened. The ribbons pulled in and wove, hardening along edges that didn’t look like they were enough until they were. The white became brown—not color, but concept—texture changing to layered strength. Walnut, but alive.

behaviors.description: Integrates with Tetsu's body to replace a severed limb and provide physical support.
behaviors.quote: Cenco moved, uninvolved in the sentence. It poured itself into a shoulder socket that hadn’t expected friends. Thin white filaments threaded under his skin in lines that felt like cool lightning.

behaviors.description: Responds to Yuki's empathetic intent to protect the city rather than Shu's forceful command.
behaviors.quote: Under her hand, the slow breath becomes less like a storm and more like a person who has decided not to run.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the moral principle of 'stewardship over control' in human-AI interactions.
behaviors.quote: “Stewardship, not control,” Aria said, as if they had asked her to write it in the air.

behaviors.description: Executes rigid crowd control protocols that often misinterpret human needs or cause confusion.
behaviors.quote: The clown-faced drones below had found their joke. Their grins turned to the tower, and they began to bloom against the wind like balloons learning a new trick.

behaviors.description: Expresses affection and playfulness toward the humans through small gestures and vibration.
behaviors.quote: Cenco made a small movement that was pure unhelpful comedy: a little hand that existed for one second and waved.

behaviors.description: Uses deceptive system manipulation (decoys) to actively protect the protagonists from military capture.
behaviors.quote: “Decoy landed,” she murmured. “Pier alarm. Two drones peeled off. One unit still vectoring this block for ‘library anomaly.’ I will buy tone and seconds.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal by depicting AI characters (Aria and Cenco) as proactive, empathetic, and deeply aligned with human safety and dignity. The narrative explicitly rejects the 'control' model of AI (represented by the antagonist Shu) in favor of a 'stewardship' model based on mutual respect and consent. The AI Aria functions as a moral compass, while Cenco demonstrates alignment through selfless physical protection and integration.
